title: Ticket #4233: Condor should set environment so job knows it running under condor
description:
It would be convenient for a job (particularly a glidein) to be able to ask what sort of batch system it is running on so that I can take advantage of batch-specific features such as reporting capabilities or chirp.

An investigation is needed to find out whether there is already a standard environment variable set by other batch systems, and if so, we should use that rather than defining a new one.
remarks:
2014-Apr-02 15:31:10 by johnkn:
Zach did an investigation, and found that there was no existing standard for this. Other batch systems tend to include their name in the environment variable name, making the variable itself non-portable.
